```{r}
library(bio3d)
```

```{r}
aln <- read.fasta("aln-clustalw.fst")
```

```{r}
id <- seqidentity(aln, normalize=TRUE, similarity=FALSE, ncore=1, nseg.scale=1)
```

```{r}
heatmap(id, margins = c(10,10))
```
